titleStmt.title: Three sermons preach'd at Salisbury the first, A.D. 1680, and again before the militia, at their going against the late Duke of Monmouth ... the second preach'd before the Right Reverend Father in God, Seth, Lord Bishop of Sarum, A.D. 1681 ... the third, preach'd A.D. 1683, at the election of the mayor ... / by Daniel Whitby.
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
